description: Value of an urn with n balls of type -1 and n+1 balls of type +1.
references: W. M. Boyce, On a simple optimal stopping problem, Discr. Math., 5 (1973), 297-312.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: a(n) = B(n, n + 1) where B(n, m) is defined in A003125.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms and title clarified by _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 02 2015
